use ```` to be able to write suggestions containing markdown ````suggestion:-0+2
```shell
git log
```
````

delete the local branches that to do not exist anymore in GitLab git checkout main
git fetch -p
git branch -vv | grep ': gone]' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -n 1 -pr git branch -D

run the GitLab runner in Docker docker run --rm -t -i -v C:\gitlab-runner\config:/etc/gitlab-runner gitlab/gitlab-runner register --non-interactive --executor "docker" --docker-image alpine:latest --url "https://gitlab.com/" --registration-token "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX" --description "myrunner" --run-untagged="true" â€“locked="false"
docker run -d --name gitlab-runner --restart always -v C:\gitlab-runner\config:/etc/gitlab-runner -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock gitlab/gitlab-runner:latest where XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX is the registration token for specific runners
C:\gitlab-runner\config will be created

get the audit of group https://gitlab.com/henixdevelopment curl --header "PRIVATE-TOKEN: <token>" https://gitlab.com/api/v4/groups/13404279/audit_events?per_page=500&page=1 get the audit of project https://gitlab.com/henixdevelopment/open-source/opentestfactory/orchestrator curl --header "PRIVATE-TOKEN: <token>" https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/27352872/audit_events?per_page=500&page=1
